name: Space Shapes (DocGeraud)
description:
Made in a few days for the Ludum Dare 35

The game lacks a scoring system but you can still play it !

  • Benjamin Rodriguez: level design
  • Antoine Druaux: gampelay programming, sounds, music
  • Géraud de Courrèges: art, UI programming
  • The 3 of us: a bit of game design
